### ModelMapper
ModelMapper is a maven library that is used for the conversion of entity objects to DTO and vice-versa

### [Regex](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/write-regular-expressions/?ref=lbp)



#### 12 Annotations of Spring Boot Framework
1. @SpringBootApplication
   @EnableAutoConfiguration + @ComponentScan + @Configuration
2. @Configration -> marks a class as a source of beans
3. @Bean
4. @Autowired
5. @Component
   @Controller (Component,MVC Contoller)
   @Service
   @Respository
6. @ComponentScan
7. @Qualifier
8. @Lazy
9. ResponseBody
10. RequestBody
11. @RestController
12. @PathVariable
    @RequestParam("email") String email
